short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension offers the option to swap opposing ideas to help confirm if the page express an idea with a double standard or not.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives you the ability to swap words of opposing ideas back and forth to make sure the text on the page is not a double standard.

Features (v.0.0.2):
- Swaps can be activated/deactivated in the popup provide.
- Personal swaps can be added in the option page. They will be saved and only accessible to you.
- Swaps can be hidden in the option page.
- Buttons' size can be changed in option page.
